plugin.name: mume_lock_pick_substitutions
plugin.author: Nick Stockton
plugin.purpose: Identifies lock picks in the player's inventory.

trigger.match: A couple of lockpicks have a small bump near the tip.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "A couple lockpicks have a small bump near the tip. (master assassin)")

trigger.match: Two of the lockpicks have shallow notches on them.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "Two of the lockpicks have shallow notches on them. (assassin guildmaster)")

trigger.match: The lockpicks are extremely well tempered.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "The lockpicks are extremely well tempered. (blue mountains)")

trigger.match: Several of the picks have long, smooth grooves along their length.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "Several of the picks have long, smooth grooves along their length. (cut-throat)")

trigger.match: There is a strange lockpick, with a sharp protrusion on one side, in the set.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "There is a strange lockpick, with a sharp protrusion on one side, in the set. (kraksh)")

trigger.match: The lockpicks feel oddly light in your hand.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "The lockpicks feel oddly light in your hand. (grey-cloaked man)")

trigger.match: The edges of most picks have been carefully sharpened.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "The edges of most picks have been carefully sharpened. (angdil)")

trigger.match: A finely shaped lockpick has been engraved with a white hand.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "A finely shaped lockpick has been engraved with a white hand. (saruman)")
